question: Is a widow entitled to a share from her deceased father in laws wealth, if he has added her husband in his will (despite the husband being deceased)?
answer:
QUESTION
My husband passed away 4 years ago, his wealth was not distributed. A few months ago my father-in-law passed away, leaving for sons behing. I wanted to know whether or not me and my children are entitled to a share of his wealth as in his willhe has stated that his wealth should be distributed between all FIVE brothers, even though one has passed away. Jazakallah!
ANSWER


Share:
A widow is not entitled to a share from her late father-in-law's estate. She will be a heir of her husband's estate only. and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best Mufti Ebrahim Desai FATWA DEPT.
